trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Guildford
There were no other sightings in Guildford on or around August 8th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was home on saturday the 8th of august watchnig something online. i saw a bright light outside my window(it was so bright i thought it was a plane on fire). when i stood up i noticed more objects. these lights were moving from west to north east. the light were amber\orange\red in colour & between 10-15 in total. then they moved into a u shape with 1 in the middle above the u. then the lights rose out of sight. i recorded it on my mobile video camera, but the footage is not that great, im no photographer.
Summary: Seen from my garden at 9:55 PM until 10:05 PM
